module.name: ap210_assembly_functional_interface_requirements
module.keywords: module, terminal, assembly, electrical, protocol, connector

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assembly functional interface requirements. Assembly Functional Interface Requirements includes the following information: functional interface model, signal constraints, external definition support, Product identification, functional usage view. Support for documentation is provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of Assembly_module_usage_view_arm;
items within the scope of Network_functional_usage_view_arm;
items within the scope of Characteristic_arm.
